title: Allow extending QueryElevationComponent
description: Similar to SOLR-7968 for extending QueryComponent, i would love to extend the elevator as well. Up until now i had to copy all code and it becomes a real mess like this.

comments.content:
This patch changes:

	private to protected
	protected where no visibility is specified
	properly indents inner class ElevationComparatorSource
comments.author: Markus Jelsma

comments.content: Markus, please see SOLR-11865 and let me know (there) if it ought to be even more extensible.
comments.author: David Smiley
